title: Gospel Stichera 9
content: (Tone 5): In the fullness of time, O Christ, * You appeared among Your beloved ones on the Sabbath evening.* And through a new wonder, * You confirmed Your resurrection from the dead* by Your entrance while the doors were closed.* You filled the disciples with joy, * granting them the Holy Spirit and bestowing on them power to forgive sins!* As for Thomas, You did not permit him to drown in the depths of faithlessness.* Therefore, grant us the knowledge of the truth* and forgiveness of sins, O compassionate Lord.
